item.title: The Point of the Clock
item.description: Today, after our workout, Kristi, my coach, Nick, a fellow CrossFitter, and myself stuck around to discuss the upcoming sectionals. Â Somewhere in the discussion, the topic of different gyms' methodologies came up. The other Stamford-based CrossFit gym, Hybrid Fitness, believes that extreme strength is pretty much the fundamental requirement for a good athelete. As such, they utilize a lot of strongman programming and training. We do not, and generally we aren't as strong on average. Does that mean we are worse than them?
